title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 402.6 - Reception
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 402.6 - Reception

State Regulations
(a) The social services district shall
establish reception procedures which provide ready access for those individuals
and families inquiring about or seeking services. (b) The social services district shall
maintain a reception unit to perform the activities by which inquiries about or
applications for services are received and referred for appropriate action. There may be a separate unit for services or a common unit for services, income
maintenance, and medical assistance. Staff of the reception unit must be
knowledgeable about district and community programs and resources. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
402.6

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
